availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William H. Ladd (Henderson County, Kentucky, tinner and councilman)

body.p: Henderson County, Kentucky, tinner and councilman. Virginia native. Married to Sarah Elder Ladd. Father of William H. Ladd, Sarah J. Ladd, Virginia Ladd, Lizzie Ladd, and John Ladd. Tinner in Warren County, Kentucky, in 1850. Tinner in Henderson County in 1860. Councilman in Henderson County from 1860 to 1862 and from 1864 to 1865.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Warren County, District 2, p. 72A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henderson County, Division 1, p. 38-39.
Edmund L. Starling, History of Henderson County, Kentucky (Henderson, KY: Edmund L. Starling, 1887), 371.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File #12412.
"William H. Ladd (1815-1895)," Find A Grave, Memorial #119409219, accessed July 27, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/119409219.
